Recommendation


When you reach out to your recommenders to ask for recommendations, it is helpful if you provide them with your goals, the reasons behind you wanting to pursue an MBA, your leadership experiences and accomplishments. Your recommenders can use this information while drafting your recommendation.

You can generate a PDF using your responses to the questions you answered in the My Profile page and provide your recommender with the PDF.
